h:
“If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.” —
Criss Jami

“How you think is as important as as what you think.” —
Unknown

“Become the kind of leader that people would follow voluntarily, even if you had no title or position.” —
Brian Tracy

“Being In The Present Means Tuning Out Distractions And Paying Attention To What Is Important, Now.” —
Spencer Johnson

“Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.” —
Lao Tzu

“Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.” —
Sun Tzu

“Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.” —
W. Clement Stone

“Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream.” —
Kahlil Gibran

“You need to be doing fewer things for more effect instead of doing more things with side effects.” —
Gary Keller

“Only when you can be extremely pliable and soft can you be extremely hard and strong.” —
Zen Proverb

“Sorrow is how we learn to love.” —
Rita Mae Brown

“Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.” —
Pablo Picasso

“Dreams are the touchstones of our characters.” —
Henry David Thoreau

“The strongest and sweetest songs yet remain to be sung.” —
Walt Whitman

“The big secret in life is that there is no big secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you're willing to work.” —
Oprah Winfrey

“Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone elses. life.” —
Steve Jobs

“Fallacies do not cease to be fallacies because they become fashions.” —
Gilbert Chesterton

“Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.” —
Coco Chanel

“Champions keep playing until they get it right.” —
Billie Jean King

“One of the oldest human needs is having someone to wonder where you are when you don't come home at night. ” —
Margaret Mead

“If you focus on success, you'll have stress. But if you pursue excellence, success will be guaranteed.” —
Deepak Chopra

“In order for you to be the BEST you can be for others, first you must be BEST for yourself.” —
Jeffrey Gitomer

“We turn not older with years but newer every day.” —
Emily Dickinson

“Because a thing seems difficult for you, do not think it impossible.” —
Marcus Aurelius

“Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.” —
Albert Einstein

“It is very obvious that we are not influenced by 'facts' but by our interpretation of the facts.” —
Alfred Adler

“Anger begins with folly, and ends with repentance. ” —
Beverly Sills

“Know your gifts and share them.” —
Les Brown

“Why live an ordinary life, when you can live an extraordinary one.” —
Tony Robbins

“We've got to live, no matter how many skies have fallen.” —
D. H. Lawrence

“We are all self-made, but only the successful will admit it.” —
Earl Nightingale

“From a certain point onward there is no longer any turning back. That is the point that must be reached.” —
Franz Kafka

“If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. If they don't, they never were.” —
Kahlil Gibran

“Don't look for meaning in the words. Listen to the silences.” —
Samuel Beckett

“I would rather be a little nobody, then to be an evil somebody.” —
Abraham Lincoln

“Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.” —
Mother Teresa

“Everything that is made beautiful and fair and lovely is made for the eye of one who sees.” —
Rumi

“FEAR has two meanings: 'Forget Everything And Run' or 'Face Everything And Rise.' The choice is yours.” —
Zig Ziglar

“Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.” —
Soren Kierkegaard

“Most of us live our lives by accident - we live as it happens. Fulfilment comes when we live our lives on purpose.” —
Simon Sinek

“Why do you stay in prison when the door is so wide open?” —
Rumi

“People spend too much time doing and not enough time thinking about what they should be doing.” —
Naval Ravikant

“There is a big difference between being centered and being self-centered.” —
Lolly Daskal

“Success on the outside means nothing unless you also have success within.” —
Robin Sharma

“If it entertains you now but will bore you someday, it's a distraction. Keep looking.” —
Naval Ravikant

“Work is always an antidote to depression.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

“Adults are just children who earn money.” —
Kenneth Branagh

“Don't try to be young. Just open your mind. Stay interested in stuff.” —
Betty White

“Today will never happen again. Don't waste it with a false start or no start at all.” —
Og Mandino

“There are more people who wish to be loved than there are who are willing to love. ” —
Nicolas Chamfort
